title: Compiler problem after upgrading the Nightly channel to 1.26.0-nightly (521d91c6b 2018-03-14), on x86_64-apple-darwin

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
# Action Done
Upgrading nightly channel (on Mac OS, x86_64).

# Error

error: internal compiler error: librustc/ich/impls_ty.rs:907: ty::TypeVariants::hash_stable() - Unexpected variant TyInfer(?0).

# Environment
rustc 1.26.0-nightly (521d91c6b 2018-03-14) running on x86_64-apple-darwin
compiler flags: -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib

<details>
<summary>Full Trace</summary>
